pkgmetadata.longdescription: `Appier <http://appier.hive.pt>`__==================================Joyful Python Web App developmentAppier is an object-oriented Python web framework built for super fast app development.It's as lightweight as possible, but not too lightweight.It gives you the power of bigger frameworks, without their complexity.Installation------------ pip install appierUsage-----.. code:: python import appier class HelloApp(appier.App): @appier.route("/", "GET") def hello(self): return "Hello World" HelloApp().serve()More----For more information consult the `website <http://appier.hive.pt>`__.
